---
title: "Jak wczytać dane do R?"
output: html_document
---

W formacie Excela

```{r}

library(xlsx)
auta2012 <- read.xlsx("/Users/pbiecek/GitHub/MOOC/dane/auta2012.xls", sheetIndex = 1)

```

W formacie tekstowym

```{r, echo=FALSE}
auta2012 <- read.table("/Users/pbiecek/GitHub/MOOC/dane/auta2012.csv",
                       sep=";", dec=",", header=TRUE)
```

W formacie binarnym

```{r, echo=FALSE}
load("/Users/pbiecek/GitHub/MOOC/dane/auta2012.rda")
```

Z pakietów

```{r, echo=FALSE}

data(auta2014, package = "SmarterPoland")

```
